categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a Jedi Knight served as the master to Leh'ahnyo Vas. The master wore brown robes and wielded twin blue lightsabers. The master worked with Leh'ahnyo Vas' unit of the Grand Army of the Republic. The unit once fought to save civilians from an advancing Confederacy of Independent Systems division, with the Jedi jumping into battle from a gunship.
The master appears in the opening story of Fantasy Flight Games' 2019 roleplaying game sourcebook Rise of the Separatists.
